summary: Godlike Battle Mage Armor for your evil mage!...
descriptionHtml:
****SPECIAL NOTICE: THE SHADOW BEAST MAGE HELMET + GLOVES + BOOTS + SHIELD LOOK VERY GOOD TOGETHER WITH MY IMPERIAL SHADOWBANE CUIRASS MOD! http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17102   IF YOU LIKE THIS MOD BE SURE TO CHECK OUT MY IMP SHADOWBANE CUIRASS =)****

****My complete Armor Set is recommended for High-Level Mages, and really shouldent be used before Level 40 and lower difficulty settings...Still you can use it regardless of level but it might get unbalanced then, anyway just have fun!****


**HOW TO INSTALL MOD: UNRAR/UNZIP THE FILE ANYWHERE YOU WANT TO AND THEN COPY THE FOLDER \"textures\" TO YOUR SKYRIM \"Data\" FOLDER (CHOOSE YES IF ASKED TO COPY AND REPLACE), NEXT, COPY \"Lost_Hideout_Of_Zal_Mel_Fur.esp\" TO YOUR \"Data\" FOLDER AND ENABLE THE FILE IN \"DATA FILES\" IN THE LAUNCHER, DONE =)**

*NOTICE!* IF YOU ALREADY DOWNLOADED MY \"Lost Hideout Of Zal Mel Fur\" PLAYER HOME YOU WILL NEED TO DISABLE/REMOVE THAT .ESP, CAUSE THIS WILL REPLACE THE \"Lost Hideout Of Zal Mel Fur\" FILE!

**ALSO BE SURE TO BACKUP YOUR SKYRIM FILES FIRST, JUST IN CASE!**


4000 Years ago, Zal Mel Fur the evil Daedric prince of magic forged his armor set in the depths of Oblivion....His Ancient Shadow Beast Armor has just been found near his Lost Hideout in Tamriel...

This is 2 (Two) complete sets of Super Heavy Enchanted Mage Armor!

My own personal Armor...

Features:

SHADOW BEAST MAGE ARMOR

ARMOR:464 WEIGHT:60 VALUE:187940

\"You are able to move more quietly, and opponents that get too close take 5 points poison damage per second.\"


SHADOW BEAST MAGE BOOTS

ARMOR:398 WEIGHT:28 VALUE:128694

\"Increases your Health, Magicka, and Stamina by 30 points.\"


SHADOW BEAST MAGE GLOVES

ARMOR:398 WEIGHT:18 VALUE:135960

\"Destruction spells cost 25% less to cast
Magicka regenerates 50% faster.\"


SHADOW BEAST MAGE HELMET

ARMOR:398 WEIGHT:40 VALUE:177203

\"+50 Magika, Destruction and Restoration spells cost 20% less.\"


SHADOW BEAST MAGE SHIELD

ARMOR:331 WEIGHT:40 VALUE:159299

\"Increases Magic Resistance by 22%\"


The Shadow Beast Mage Armor is located at the Zal Mel Fur Hideout (Included .esp file) in a locked chest (Master), The Hideout is marked on the map...

*Notice* \"Shadow Beast Mage Armor\" is based on \"Thalmor Robes\" \"Daedric\" \"Dragonplate\" Clothes/Armor so all \"Thalmor Robes\" \"Daedric\" \"Dragonplate\" Clothes/Armor will also change to Black color ingame.
author: DarkIncLegion and VelociraptorGTX
